docbuild.models.config.env.Env_TargetPaths
==========================================

.. py:class:: docbuild.models.config.env.Env_TargetPaths(/, **data: Any)

   Bases: :py:obj:`pydantic.BaseModel`

   .. autoapi-inheritance-diagram:: docbuild.models.config.env.Env_TargetPaths
      :parts: 1


   Defines target paths.


   .. py:attribute:: model_config

      Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [`ConfigDict`][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].



   .. py:attribute:: target_path
      :type:  str
      :value: None


      The destination path for final built documentation.



   .. py:attribute:: backup_path
      :type:  pathlib.Path
      :value: None


      Path for backups.
